thread.title: Chelsea transfer news: AC Milan set to revive interest in Cesc Fabregas | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer news: AC Milan set to revive interest in Cesc Fabregas | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea transfer news: AC Milan set to revive interest in Cesc Fabregas | Metro News

organizations.name: cesc fabregas | metro news ac milan

text:
AC Milan set to revive interest in Chelsea midfielder Cesc Fabregas this summer gossip Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Sunday 26 Feb 2017 2:45 pm Chelsea midfielder Cesc Fabregas (Picture: Getty) 
AC Milan will revive their interest in Chelsea midfielder Cesc Fabregas this summer, reports say. 
Fabregas was strongly linked with a move away from Stamford Bridge during the January transfer window, but remained in west London and has since impressed for Antonio Conte. Jurgen Klopp sends warning to his Liverpool flops after Leicester loss 
In his 300th Premier League appearance against Swansea on Saturday, the Spaniard scored and provided an assist as Chelsea clinched a routine 3-1 victory. 
Fabregas, 29, recently insisted he would remain at the Premier League leaders beyond the current campaign despite Conteâ€™s tendency to start him on the bench. 
But while the midfielder appears content with his role at Chelsea, Calciomercato say Serie A giants Milan hope to secure his services at the end of the season. Blues boss Antonio Conte will be reluctant for Fabregas to leave (Picture: Getty) 
It is claimed the club believe Fabregas is the ideal man to build their side around and help Milan restore their image in Europe.
